Job Description:
DevOps Engineer - Noida,  India

Role: DevOps Engineer

Employment Type: Full Time (Permanent)

Job Location: Noida

Education/ Qualification: B.  Tech/ MCA in Computer Science or Information Technology

Experience: 3-4

Job Responsibilities:- 

  Designing and implementing a build process and infrastructure that delivers high-quality software at a rapid pace. 

  AWS provisioning,  deployment,  and monitoring. 

Key Responsibilities:- 

  Responsible for the framework that provides the facility for Continuous Integration and Continuous Deployment. 

  Responsible for collaborating with developers to build code,  manage issues,  and successfully deploy our software. 

  Troubleshoot,  compile and build failures,  and facilitate resolution. 

  Improve the speed,  efficiency,  and scalability of the continuous integration environment,  automating wherever possible. 

  Assist developers in managing version control branches/ tags. 

  Manage the deployment of software components into QA,  Staging and Production environments. 

Key Skills: 

  Hands on experience with Continuous Integration tools such as Jenkins. 

  Hands on experience on build tools such as Maven. 

  Experience in developing shell/ Python scripting. 

  Expert knowledge of source control management systems (i. e.  GitHub) and code branching/ merging strategies. 

  Experience with SQL and relational databases administration (i. e.  MySQL,  MS SQL,  Oracle). 

  Ability to learn and evaluate emerging tools. 

  Excellent communication skills.
